DOC.brief_summary: The investigators sought to compare the intraosseous access success rates of the proximal tibia and the proximal humerus using new Intraosseous access device "NIO" in an adult cadaver model during simulated resuscitation.
DOC.brief_title: Trial Comparing Proximal Tibia and Proximal Humerus Infusion Rates Using the NIO Intraosseous Device
DOC.criteria: give voluntary consent to participate in the study paramedics without previous experience in intraosseous devices not meet the above criteria
